body:
if you want to have solar raditaion output in W/m2, then you have to use
the -O 1 option for gendaylit (see manpage).
in your case, you get then 246 W/m2 calculated...

cheers,
Jan

Am 7/30/14, 6:36 PM, schrieb Ehsan M.Vazifeh:
